    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        @RequestMapping(path="CreateCoupon",
                method=POST)
public boolean createCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                @RequestBody
                                                                                                Coupon coupon)
                                                                                         throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which tries to create a new coupon for the current company
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        coupon - A coupon object to create.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was created.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the coupon title is the same as another one in DB.

                                                                                                          @RequestBody
                                                                                                          Coupon coupon)
                                                                                                   throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which receives a coupon and deletes it.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        coupon - The coupon which will be removed.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when getting data from DB has failed.

      • updateCoupon

        @RequestMapping(path="UpdateCoupon",
                method=POST)
public boolean updateCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                @RequestBody
                                                                                                Coupon coupon)
                                                                                         throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which updates an existing coupon price and end date.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        coupon - The coupon which will be updated.
        Returns:
        True if the coupon was updated.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when received coupon id is null.

      • getCoupon

        @RequestMapping(path="GetCoupon",
                method=GET)
public Coupon getCoupon(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                        @RequestParam
                                                                                        long couponId)
                                                                                 throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which receives an id and returns the corresponding coupon.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        couponId - An id of a coupon to get.
        Returns:
        a Coupon object that with the same id.Null if Couldn't get the coupon.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if the received id is null.

      • getAllCouponsByPrice

        @RequestMapping(path="GetAllCouponsByPrice",
                method=GET)
public java.util.ArrayList<Coupon> getAllCouponsByPrice(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                                                   @RequestParam
                                                                                                                                   double price)
                                                                                                                            throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns the company coupons with the same end date.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        price - The price to filter the coupons (up-to)
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of all of the company coupons up-to the date.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if either the price or the receivedId is null.

      • getCurrentCompany

        @RequestMapping(path="MyInfo",
                method=GET)
public Company getCurrentCompany(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session)
                                                                                       throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which returns the company with the given Id.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected company.
        Returns:
        A Company object which represent current connected company.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if the received Id is null.

      • login

        @RequestMapping(path="Login/{name}/{password}",
                method=GET)
public boolean login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                   @PathVariable(value="password")
                                                                                                   java.lang.String password)
                                                                                            throws LoginException
        A function to check for login info of different companies.
        Specified by:
        login in class ClientController
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the company.
        password - Password of the company.
        request - The request from the client.
        Returns:
        True if login was successful.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Can happen when there is no company with the same name and password in DB.
